experience.title: Product Manager - EMI Cards
experience.description: • Drove product efforts for digitization of No Cost EMI Cards from inception to go-live and subsequent feature updates• Reduced card delivery TAT from around 30 days to 2 minutes, which improved early activations and NPS by a substantial percentage• Worked with cross-functional teams including engineering, design, marketing, risk, legal, finance et al • Dove deep into customer activation and retention data to improve the metrics through product improvements• Prepared product roadmaps, user stories, and PRDs to ensure smooth product development and delivery• Identified, prototyped and viability-tested app features based on customer behavior data
experience.description_html: • Drove product efforts for digitization of No Cost EMI Cards from inception to go-live and subsequent feature updates• Reduced card delivery TAT from around 30 days to 2 minutes, which improved early activations and NPS by a substantial percentage• Worked with cross-functional teams including engineering, design, marketing, risk, legal, finance et al • Dove deep into customer activation and retention data to improve the metrics through product improvements• Prepared product roadmaps, user stories, and PRDs to ensure smooth product development and delivery• Identified, prototyped and viability-tested app features based on customer behavior data

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: • Performed in-depth analysis of G Suite market landscape in tier II cities in India• Performed market sizing activities along with identification of potential markets• Devised a Go-to-Market strategy to tap the untapped potential of G Suite• Identified potential key accounts and partners to drive growth in tier II cities • Initiated partnership and business association conversations with potential partners and clients

experience.title: Data Warehouse Engineer
experience.description: • Worked on Business Intelligence tools such as Informatica Power Center 9.1 and SAP Business Objects• Worked on enhancements and development of ETL mappings to transform raw data from multiple sources into meaningful insights• Worked on creating Business Objects front-end analytical reports• Experience in working with Business Analysts to understand the business requirements and   translate them into ETL code

education.description: Activities and Societies: President, Public Relations Cell • Led the 21-member strong team of Public Relations Cell of the institute • Developed editorial content including official press releases of IIM Rohtak • Maintained existing and forged new relationships with media houses • Was responsible for ensuring electronic and print media coverage about IIM Rohtak • Devised strategies for brand building of IIM Rohtak on digital platforms • Managed aspirant relations for the admissions process 2016 • Regularly collaborated with college… Show more
